Line1.EDC7F: Should’ve cut and run when I had the chance. Like the others did. The smart ones. Everything they said about Kemir is true. Mad as a viper.
Line3.EDC7F: Why did I follow her into this damn mine? She wants to die here. Said it herself. A glorious last stand. And still I went along with it like a whipped dog.
Line5.EDC7F: Should’ve cut and run when I had the chance.
VoiceDir1.EDC7F: Desperate. Anxious. A touch angry with himself.
